Package gov.nasa.larcfm.Util

Class Matrix2d

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.larcfm.Util.Matrix2d
  • public class Matrix2d
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a basic (and naive) implementation of an MxN (row x column) matrix of doubles, with associated functions. Vectors are treated as Mx1 matrices.

    • Field Summary
